data.title: Madrid → La Robla by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Madrid to La Robla in 2h 49m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Madrid to La Robla today.
data.text:
If you want to travel from Madrid to La Robla by train, you've come to the right place.

You can expect the journey from Madrid to La Robla by train to take around 3 hours 45 minutes. If you want to get there as quickly as possible, it can take as little as 2 hours 49 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll usually find around 2 trains per day running on this route, which spans 193 miles (310 km). You’ll have to make 1 change along the way on your journey to La Robla. Renfe is the main rail company operating on this route. Having the widest network of high-speed trains in Europe, Renfe will make your train travel experience in Spain an enjoyable one.

You can save money on train tickets from Madrid to La Robla if you book in Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to search for cheap ticket prices – we'll show you how much you can save on train tickets from Madrid to La Robla if you book in advance.. Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.

If you want to know more about the journey, keep reading for timetables, tips on finding cheap tickets and FAQs, including first and last train times. Want to go straight to booking? Start a search with us today!
